title: Dazzling Diamond and Rose Gold 'Poola Haaram' with Matching 'Jhumka' Set
materials: 18K Rose Gold and White Gold. Features meticulously cut Diamonds of VS clarity and G color. Crafted with a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting sheen.
features: This exquisite set showcases a three-layered 'Poola Haaram' (flower garland necklace) design, complemented by matching 'Jhumka' earrings. The delicate floral and heart-shaped motifs are adorned with sparkling diamonds, set in both rose gold and white gold for a two-tone effect. The openwork design adds a touch of modern elegance to this traditional style.
occasions: and high-end events. Its elegant design makes it suitable for modern cocktail parties as well as traditional Telugu ceremonies like Muhurtham
or a grand half-saree function (Langa Voni).
description: This diamond 'Poola Haaram' set blends classic South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The two-tone gold creates a versatile look, while the high-quality diamonds add unparalleled sparkle and value. The Hyderabadi polish ensures longevity and a radiant finish, making it a treasured heirloom for generations to come.
